# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `recent_falls`
* Variable label: `Recent falls in the last 6-24 months`
* Variable description: `Recent falls in the last 6-24 months`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No
1        | Yes

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

```{r lab, echo=FALSE}
ds_label <- "Recent falls"
ds_label_all <- "Recent falls in the last 6-24 months"
```


# Data process

## Cuba

### Wave 1

#### Study-specific variable description

The study-specific variables elected to be harmonised is:


* Name: `ONS19`
* Label: `HAS-DDS early symptoms - falls`
* Categories:
   + `0 = No`  
   + `1 = Yes` 
* Missings
   + `NA`


```{r assign Cuba w1, echo=FALSE}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 's1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline', variables=list('ONS19'), missings = TRUE)
s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls <- opal.execute(o,'s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls')
```

```{r local Cuba w1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls$ONS19
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls, aes(x=factor(ONS19))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Recent Falls") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo Cuba w1}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls$id)
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls <- recode(s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls$ONS19, "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1,"Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript Cuba w1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(recent_falls))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Recent Falls") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation Cuba w1, echo=FALSE}
AfterH <- table(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls)
X<-table(s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls$ONS19)
nas<-sum(is.na(s1066_Cuba_w1_recent_falls$ONS19))
BeforeH <-c(X,nas)
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("0->0","1->1","NA->999")
kable(C)
```

```{r importOPAL Cuba w1, echo=FALSE}
label(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls) <- "Recent falls in the last 6-24 months"
recent_falls <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1
save(recent_falls, file = "../RData/cuba_w1/recent_falls.RData")
#opal.assign.data(o, 't1066_ds_cuba_w1', t1066_ds_cuba_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'t1066_ds_cuba_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')

t1066_m_ds_cuba_w1 <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1
t1066_m_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls <- recode(t1066_m_ds_cuba_w1$recent_falls, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
#opal.assign.data(o, 't1066_m_ds_cuba_w1', t1066_m_ds_cuba_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'t1066_m_ds_cuba_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
```
